metadata.title: CVE-2018-10242 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Suricata version 4.0.4 incorrectly handles the parsing of the SSH banner. A malformed SSH banner can cause the parsing code to read beyond the allocated data because SSHParseBanner in app-layer-ssh.c lacks a length check.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10242` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

suricata - 1:4.0.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: suricata package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.0.0-1').
